thread.title: The FCC Imposes Netflix’s Broadband Policy
thread.title_full: The FCC Imposes Netflix’s Broadband Policy - WSJ

author: Holman W. Jenkins, Jr.
title: The FCC Imposes Netflix’s Broadband Policy
text:
TV stocks had a cow a few weeks ago when Disney’s CEO announced that ESPN was losing subscribers due to cord-cutting. Surely if ESPN was threatened the jig was up. Live sports were supposed to be the salvation of the existing TV bundle.
For one reason, though, the market’s fear may be exaggerated. A great deal more bandwidth will be needed, and where it will come from isn’t clear. An otherwise inauspicious Obama economy has delivered a better-than-doubling of average wired Internet speeds in America. But as disparate... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
